metadata.name: Process Access via TrolleyExpress Exclusion
metadata.comment: Detects a possible process memory dump that uses the white-listed Citrix TrolleyExpress.exe filename as a way to dump the lsass process memory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\trolleyexpress 7')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\trolleyexpress 8')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\trolleyexpress 9')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\trolleyexpress.exe 7')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\trolleyexpress.exe 8')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\trolleyexpress.exe 9')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\trolleyexpress.exe -ma ')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\trolleyexpress.exe')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('ctxinstall')) OR process.file.name is null)))

output.summary: Detects a possible process memory dump that uses the white-listed Citrix TrolleyExpress.exe filename as a way to dump the lsass process memory

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://twitter.com/_xpn_/status/1491557187168178176, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ie831jF0bb0
